title: Add introduction page with 'How it works?' link

requirements.summary: Add a semi-transparent 'How it works? (运作规则)' text link below the ENTER button on the splash screen that opens an introduction modal when clicked
acceptanceCriteria: Link appears below ENTER button with reduced opacity styling
Clicking the link opens the introduction modal
Link text displays 'How it works? (运作规则)' in the current language

file_operations.description: Add a semi-transparent link below the ENTER button that displays 'How it works? (运作规则)' using translation keys. The link should have reduced opacity styling (e.g., opacity-60 hover:opacity-100) and trigger the introduction modal state when clicked. Position the link with proper spacing below the existing call-to-action button while maintaining the splash screen's visual hierarchy and dark theme styling.

Create a modal component using shadcn/ui Dialog pattern (similar to AddToPotDialog and DailyCheckIn dialogs) that displays the complete Grit Bounty introduction content. Structure the modal with five main sections using proper typography hierarchy (headings, body text, bullet points, emphasis). Make the content scrollable when it exceeds viewport height. Support closing via close button and clicking outside. Use translation keys from i18n for all content. Apply consistent dark theme styling with OKLCH colors matching the existing design system.

requirements.summary: Create an introduction modal component that displays the complete Grit Bounty concept and rules in a scrollable format with proper typography hierarchy and sections
acceptanceCriteria: Modal displays all five sections with clear visual hierarchy
Content is scrollable if it exceeds viewport height
Modal can be closed via close button or clicking outside
Sections are properly formatted with headings, bullet points, and emphasis

file_operations.description: Create the IntroductionModal component that renders five distinct sections: Core Mission, Use Cases, Bounty Mechanism, Settlement Rules, and Warrior Credit System. Each section should have a clear heading (text-xl or text-2xl), properly formatted body content with paragraphs, bullet points for lists, and emphasis for important values (like percentages and ICP amounts). Use the ScrollArea component if needed for overflow content. Import and use translation keys from i18n/translations.ts for all text content. Follow the existing modal patterns in the codebase for consistent styling and behavior.

requirements.summary: Add translation keys for the complete introduction content in all three supported languages (English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese) covering: Core Mission, Use Cases, Bounty Mechanism, Settlement Rules, and Warrior Credit System
acceptanceCriteria: All introduction sections have translation keys in frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts
English translation accurately conveys the platform concept
Simplified Chinese matches the provided content exactly
Traditional Chinese is properly converted from Simplified Chinese
Examples include: waking at 5am, vegetarian diet, vitamin C intake, 10km running, making 3 friends daily, enterprise app promotion

file_operations.description: Add a new top-level 'introduction' section to the translations structure containing nested keys for all five sections: coreMission (title, content), useCases (title, intro, examples array with items like '5am wake-up', 'vegetarian diet', 'vitamin C intake', '10km running', '3 new friends daily', 'enterprise app promotion'), bountyMechanism (title, taskPublishing, crowdfunding, acceptance), settlementRules (title, successPayout, unclaimedRefund, defaultForfeit, platformFees with '6%' emphasis), and warriorCreditSystem (title, initialDeposit '50%', reductionRate '3%', minimumRate '2%', resetCondition). Provide accurate translations for all three languages (en, zh-CN, zh-TW). Ensure Chinese content matches the user-provided text exactly. Include the modal link text 'How it works? (运作规则)' as a separate key.
